title: I cant login
body: whenever i go to login on the Oceania server it comes up that there was an unexpected error and when i try again it stays on authenticating till i close it pleaseeee help

replies.body: Those unexpected errors can sometimes be a little hard to narrow down, but more often than not it can be traced back to something blocking your network from reaching our servers. Let's double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) first, and if that doesn't help let me know!
